title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Second Floor, Room Plans/ Furniture Layout", January 14, 1937
medium: Graphite, black ink, red, blue, yellow, and green color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 553-2/F.S./ANDERSON, OLSSON/1/14/37; lower right: MR. HAROLD ANDERSON HOUSE BEL AIR CAL./FURNITURE LAYOUT SECOND FLOOR SCALE 1/4"=1'0"; inscribed throughout with instructions, labels, and rough notes
description: Floor plan and furniture layout for second floor. Two bedrooms, bathroom, and steamroom  on west side of floor plan; porch extended from far left. Passage way at right leading to staircase. Large study at center of plan near south; guest room to right of study. Two dressing rooms and bathroom along north wall. Large master bedroom in lower right corner of plan with porch extended at far right.  Notes and rough sketches in margins of paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Second Floor, Room Plans/ Furniture Layout", January 14, 1937.
January 14, 1937. Graphite, black ink, red, blue, yellow, and green color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-623.
